about-me.headline: Who is Philipp?
about-me.title: About Me
about-me.content:
I am Philipp Biebert, a full-stack web developer with a technical background in construction. After several years as a site manager, I transferred my structured, solution-oriented approach to software development. My professional background brings a high level of organization, responsibility, planning reliability, and project understanding to web development.

Today, I develop modern web applications with a focus on clean code, clear structures, and functional user interfaces. As a full-stack developer, I accompany projects holistically – from conception to implementation to the finished application – and place great value on maintainability, performance, and comprehensible solutions.

stack.title: Skill Set
stack.headlineContent: I work as a full-stack developer with modern frontend technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and Angular as well as backend solutions with Python, Django, and REST APIs. I integrate new technologies quickly and flexibly.

projectsHome.title: Projects
projectsHome.introText: Discover my projects and get an insight into my way of working as a full-stack web developer. Each project is responsive, user-friendly, and implemented with a focus on efficient, cleanly structured code. Take a look around, test the applications, and experience the solutions in action.

items.title: Join
items.shortDescription: Kanban-style task manager. Organize tasks via drag-and-drop and assign users and categories.
items.description: Join is a task management tool inspired by Kanban. It enables teams to efficiently plan, organize, and track tasks.
items.implementationDetails: The project was implemented with Angular, HTML, and JavaScript. It includes drag-and-drop functionality, responsive design, and an intuitive user interface.

items.title: Sharkie
items.shortDescription: Browser-based jump-and-run game. Guide Sharkie through an exciting level, collect coins and poison bottles, and defeat the killer whale.
items.description: Sharkie is a browser-based jump-and-run game where you master a level as a little shark, overcome obstacles, collect coins and poison bottles, and fight the killer whale.
items.implementationDetails: The game was developed with Angular and uses modern web technologies for animations and interactions.

items.title: DA-Bubble
items.shortDescription: This app is a Slack clone. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with an intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and strong channel organization.
items.description: DA-Bubble is a communication platform for groups that facilitates exchange and collaboration.
items.implementationDetails: The application is based on Angular and offers features such as group chats, notifications, and a modern UI.

items.name: Max Mustermann
items.reference: Philipp always kept an overview in the team and implemented our tasks efficiently. His structured approach and technical competence helped us a lot.

items.name: Anna Beispiel
items.reference: Philipp strengthened the frontend team with his clear solutions and support on complex tasks. Working with him was very pleasant.

items.name: Paul Muster
items.reference: Philipp always completed his tasks reliably and contributed helpful ideas. Thanks to him, we were able to complete our projects efficiently.

contactMe.intro: I'm looking forward to hearing from you! As a full-stack web developer, I'm always looking for new projects where I can contribute my knowledge in frontend and backend technologies and further develop my skills.
contactMe.experience: With my experience in JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, Python, Django, and REST APIs, I actively contribute to efficient, structured, and user-friendly solutions. I enjoy working in teams, taking responsibility for tasks, and bringing creative ideas to successfully implement projects.
contactMe.outro: If you are planning a new project or need support in web development, I look forward to your message and to working together on exciting solutions.
contactMe.messagePlaceholder: Hello Philipp, I am interested in...
contactMe.privacyText2: and agree to the processing of my data by external service providers.
contactMe.thankYouSub: I will get back to you as soon as possible

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.name: Philipp Alexander Biebert
imprint.section4Text1: This website is for private and informational purposes only.
imprint.section4Text2: There is no journalistic or editorial content.
imprint.section5Text1: As a service provider, I am responsible for my own content on these pages according to § 7 Abs.1 TMG and general laws.
imprint.section5Text2: According to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, I am not obliged to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
imprint.section6Text1: This website may contain links to external third-party websites over whose content I have no influence.
imprint.section6Text2: No guarantee is given for this external content.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.responsibleText: The controller within the meaning of data protection laws, in particular the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), is:
privacy.name: Philipp Alexander Biebert
privacy.rightsText: You may exercise the following rights at any time using the contact details provided, in accordance with the GDPR:
rightsList: Access to your data stored by us (Art. 15 GDPR)
privacy.revocation: You may revoke your consent at any time with effect for the future.
privacy.supervisoryAuthorities: A list of the competent supervisory authorities can be found at:
privacy.contactText: If you contact us via contact form, email or telephone, the data you provide will be stored for the purpose of processing your request.
privacy.legalBasisText: Processing is carried out in accordance with Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR on the basis of a legitimate interest in simple communication.
privacy.storageDurationText: Personal data will be deleted no later than 90 days after completion of the request, unless there are statutory retention obligations.
privacy.objectionText: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal data at any time.
privacy.changesText: We reserve the right to amend this privacy policy to comply with current legal requirements.
privacy.questionsText: If you have any questions about data protection, please contact the controller by email.
